description.value:
This +2 greater resilient @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.equipment-srd.Studded Leather Armor]{Studded Leather Armor} is made of hardened fungus. Every day the armor grows dozens of unusual mushrooms that can be used for cooking, infused reagents, or common spell material components.

Activate r or a Envision

Frequency once per day

Trigger You are hit by a melee, ranged, or spell attack

Effect The attack misses you, dealing no damage as you transform into a cloud of spores. You gain the benefits of a @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Gaseous Form]{Gaseous Form} spell for 1 minute.

For the duration, a cloud of deadly spores surrounds you. Each breathing creature that begins its turn within 10 feet of you takes [[/r 6d8[poison]]] damage (@Check[type:fortitude|dc:35|basic:true|name:Fungal Armor Spores]).

You can @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.actionspf2e.Dismiss]{Dismiss} the cloud form.

Craft Requirements Supply a casting of @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Cloudkill]{Cloudkill} and gaseous form.

source.value: Pathfinder #161: Belly of the Black Whale
